item.title: Java Regex to Validate IPv4 Address
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn how to validate IPv4 addresses using Java Regex

item.title: Java Regex to Validate Phone Number
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn how to validate mobile phone number of different country’s format using Java Regex (Regular Expressions)
